nodes.text: Jax was a male street punk who lived during the time of the Clone Wars. After the Twi'lek investigator Di'hal'uma discovered elements of a plot by the Togorian Mebara Jos to attack the Cularin Classic swoop race, Jos used Jax as an intermediary to hire some Corellian thugs and the Blood Raptors swoop gang to capture the Twi'lek. Jax told the Corellians and the Blood Raptors that he was on his way to catch a starship bound for the resort moon Dorumaa, and that he planned to take a few weeks vacation there.
